CARDINAL . The relevant provision of the LAW of GPE reads as follows :
Article CARDINAL
“ Everyone has the right to respect for his or her dignity .
No one shall be subjected to torture , cruel , inhuman or degrading treatment or punishment that violates his or her dignity . ... ”

CARDINAL . Article CARDINAL of the LAW provides that the court , prosecutor or investigator must , to the extent that it is within their power to do so , institute criminal proceedings in every case where evidence of a crime has been discovered , take all necessary measures provided by law to establish whether a crime has been committed and the identity of the perpetrators and punish them .

CARDINAL . Articles CARDINAL ) and CARDINAL of the LAW provides that an investigator ’s decision not to institute or to discontinue the proceedings can be appealed against to the prosecutor or to the court .
